openHitbox/openHitboxindex.title: openHitbox
openHitbox/openHitboxindex.content:
openHitbox
openHit box is as it describes at hitbox syle controller. It was born of my enjoyment of tekken and a the price of other fightpads/hitboxes, often over 100 dollars. So I decided to create my own. Currently there is only one prototype of the openHitbox. However a version two is in the works now featureing a pcb and hotswap sockets, and I also would like to create a version that supports Gateron Low Profile Switches the software side of things will be powered by  GP2040-CE and for the mcu a  Waveshare RP2040-Zero will be used becuase it has enough pins to support all of the buttons used by a hitbox as well has have
